name: webpage-wc
description: Prints number of words in one or more webpages using the Readablity API

scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.postinstall: echo 'The Readability API is no longer available, this tool now uses Mercury Web Parser API. Please remove the previous configuration file manually.'
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post

author: Muhammad Fawwaz Orabi <mfawwaz93@gmail.com> (http://forabi.github.io)
